summary.title: Personal Profile
summary.text: Built real-time defect-detection systems for industrial thermography, spanning data validation, model development, and edge-ready inference. I bridge applied CV with production constraints, delivering on-site deployments, customer demos, and measurable inspection gains. Recently led a 3-6 person AI team while shipping both real-time and post-processing models for field use.
